langue.jumbo-text: Work to live or live to work?
langue.block_1-3-para: Gispen has been supporting healthcare since 1916
langue.row2-para: People perform better in an optimal environment. This is our philosophy. Whether it be their working environment, living or caring. We create this optimal environment by following a muti-phase working process. We guide you from inspiration all the way to realization. Your work, learn and care processes are the primary focus for the solutions that we offer: A comfortable and functional environment.
langue.row2-text-para: ‘Our new interior gives inspiration for that many more ideas’
langue.row2-btn: Visit one of our reference projects here
langue.block_3-1-header: Clients and Gispen; A new way of working
langue.block_3-2-para: Designs diversify themselves through their intelligent simplicity
langue.block_3-3-header: Start somewhere, start changing: that is Circular Economy
langue.row4-para: Through our furniture you can create an individual atmosphere and comfortness at home. Designed by talented designer, following the way of ‘playing of tradition’. Playful, functional and sustainable.
langue.block_4-1-para: Feeling at home, at home with Gispen
langue.block_4-2-para: Make an experience out of your dinner time
langue.block_4-4-para: Work where-ever; when-ever. Keeping knowledge in the company
langue.block_4-5-para: Gain from wastage: New business models for sustainable growth
langue.block_4-6-para: Your furniture for your ‘peace of mind’
langue.row5-header: A name to be proud to be proud
langue.row5-para: Already for 100 years we have been coming ourselves. Many of the designs of Mr. Willem Hendrik Gispen have become ‘classics’ over time. They are celebrated in many history books all around the world. And still, every year new products come of the drawing board. Designed for the future, and destined to become classics of their own.
langue.block_5-1-para: Stubborn, characteristics and as much comfortness as all other heritage of W.H. Gispen
langue.block_5-2-para: One of the Gispen classics. Copied by many, matched by no-one.
